pieces.name: Initiate's Flower
pieces.lore: A small flower. Cute and adorable, just like the early spring of North Teyvat.

pieces.name: Initiate's Feather
pieces.lore: An item attached to the grip of a traveler's first sword, bearing the modest dreams of its wielder.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Max HP increased by 1,000.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Flower
pieces.lore: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
pieces.lore: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
pieces.lore: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

pieces.name: Adventurer's Bandana
pieces.lore: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: DEF increased by 100.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
pieces.lore: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
pieces.lore: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
pieces.lore: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
pieces.lore: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

pieces.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
pieces.lore: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases incoming healing by 20%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
pieces.lore: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
pieces.lore: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
pieces.lore: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

pieces.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
pieces.lore: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: ATK +18%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

pieces.name: Heart of Comradeship
pieces.lore: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

pieces.name: Feather of Homecoming
pieces.lore: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

pieces.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
pieces.lore: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

pieces.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
pieces.lore: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

pieces.name: Crown of Parting
pieces.lore: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: All Elemental RES increased by 20%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Incoming Elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
pieces.lore: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
pieces.lore: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
pieces.lore: Just an ordinary everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
pieces.lore: A cup commonly used for fortunetelling. It can also hold water, of course.

pieces.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
pieces.lore: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: CRIT Rate +12%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

pieces.name: Berserker's Rose
pieces.lore: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

pieces.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
pieces.lore: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

pieces.name: Berserker's Timepiece
pieces.lore: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left â€” both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

pieces.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
pieces.lore: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

pieces.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
pieces.lore: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

pieces.name: Instructor's Brooch
pieces.lore: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

pieces.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
pieces.lore: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

pieces.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

pieces.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
pieces.lore: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

pieces.name: Instructor's Cap
pieces.lore: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

pieces.name: Exile's Flower
pieces.lore: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

pieces.name: Exile's Feather
pieces.lore: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

pieces.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

pieces.name: Exile's Goblet
pieces.lore: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

pieces.name: Exile's Circlet
pieces.lore: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: DEF +30%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

pieces.name: Guardian's Flower
pieces.lore: An iris that was cherished by the Guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the Guardian loved.

pieces.name: Guardian's Sigil
pieces.lore: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone's yearning to defend others like a shield.

pieces.name: Guardian's Clock
pieces.lore: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

pieces.name: Guardian's Vessel
pieces.lore: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

pieces.name: Guardian's Band
pieces.lore: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

pieces.name: Medal of the Brave
pieces.lore: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

pieces.name: Prospect of the Brave
pieces.lore: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

pieces.name: Fortitude of the Brave
pieces.lore: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

pieces.name: Outset of the Brave
pieces.lore: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

pieces.name: Crown of the Brave
pieces.lore: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
pieces.lore: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
pieces.lore: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
pieces.lore: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
pieces.lore: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

pieces.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
pieces.lore: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Defeating an opponent has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

pieces.name: Gambler's Brooch
pieces.lore: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

pieces.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
pieces.lore: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

pieces.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

pieces.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
pieces.lore: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

pieces.name: Gambler's Earrings
pieces.lore: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

pieces.name: Scholar's Bookmark
pieces.lore: A dried flower used as a bookmark, it had absorbed the scent from the pages.

pieces.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
pieces.lore: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen, the tip has long been stained black.

pieces.name: Scholar's Clock
pieces.lore: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

pieces.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
pieces.lore: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

pieces.name: Scholar's Lens
pieces.lore: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

bonuses.name: One Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

bonuses.name: One Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

bonuses.name: One Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

bonuses.name: One Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
pieces.lore: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Destiny
pieces.lore: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Longing
pieces.lore: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
pieces.lore: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

pieces.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
pieces.lore: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow.

pieces.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
pieces.lore: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

pieces.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
pieces.lore: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

pieces.name: Concert's Final Hour
pieces.lore: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

pieces.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
pieces.lore: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which plays a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

pieces.name: Conductor's Top Hat
pieces.lore: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Elemental Burst DMG +20%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

pieces.name: Royal Flora
pieces.lore: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

pieces.name: Royal Plume
pieces.lore: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

pieces.name: Royal Pocket Watch
pieces.lore: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

pieces.name: Royal Silver Urn
pieces.lore: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

pieces.name: Royal Masque
pieces.lore: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Physical DMG Bonus +25%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s. Also triggers with wild animals such as boars, squirrels and frogs.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
pieces.lore: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
pieces.lore: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
pieces.lore: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
pieces.lore: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

pieces.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
pieces.lore: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Character Healing Effectiveness +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

pieces.name: Maiden's Distant Love
pieces.lore: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

pieces.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
pieces.lore: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

pieces.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
pieces.lore: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
pieces.lore: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

pieces.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
pieces.lore: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Anemo DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

pieces.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
pieces.lore: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

pieces.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
pieces.lore: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
pieces.lore: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
pieces.lore: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

pieces.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
pieces.lore: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Geo DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

pieces.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
pieces.lore: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

pieces.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
pieces.lore: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

pieces.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
pieces.lore: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. It's lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

pieces.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
pieces.lore: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

pieces.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
pieces.lore: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 35%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Bloom
pieces.lore: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

pieces.name: Summer Night's Finale
pieces.lore: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Moment
pieces.lore: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
pieces.lore: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

pieces.name: Summer Night's Mask
pieces.lore: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Electro RES increased by 40%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Heart
pieces.lore: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Plume
pieces.lore: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

pieces.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
pieces.lore: A timepiece kept by hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shard of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
pieces.lore: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

pieces.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
pieces.lore: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Electro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

pieces.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
pieces.lore: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

pieces.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
pieces.lore: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

pieces.name: Hourglass of Thunder
pieces.lore: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

pieces.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
pieces.lore: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

pieces.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
pieces.lore: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Pyro RES increased by 40%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
pieces.lore: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
pieces.lore: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Torment
pieces.lore: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
pieces.lore: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

pieces.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
pieces.lore: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Pyro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

pieces.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
pieces.lore: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

pieces.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
pieces.lore: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

pieces.name: Witch's End Time
pieces.lore: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

pieces.name: Witch's Heart Flames
pieces.lore: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

pieces.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
pieces.lore: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Cryo DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

pieces.name: Snowswept Memory
pieces.lore: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

pieces.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
pieces.lore: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

pieces.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
pieces.lore: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

pieces.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
pieces.lore: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

pieces.name: Broken Rime's Echo
pieces.lore: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Hydro DMG Bonus +15%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

pieces.name: Gilded Corsage
pieces.lore: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

pieces.name: Gust of Nostalgia
pieces.lore: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

pieces.name: Copper Compass
pieces.lore: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

pieces.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
pieces.lore: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

pieces.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
pieces.lore: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the ATK of all nearby party members is increased by 20% and their Shield Strength is increased by 30% for 3s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

pieces.name: Flower of Accolades
pieces.lore: A flower made from gold leaf. It represents the glories and honors attained by its wearer

pieces.name: Ceremonial War-Plume
pieces.lore: A falcon feather worn on ceremonial occasions. It displays the dignity and resolve of Liyue Harbor to the outside world.

pieces.name: Orichalceous Time-Dial
pieces.lore: A simple device for telling time. This was once standard-issue for the Millelith during times of war.

pieces.name: Noble's Pledging Vessel
pieces.lore: A golden cup used by the Millelith to take their oaths. Still bears the lovely scent of wine.

pieces.name: General's Ancient Helm
pieces.lore: A splendorous helmet from ages past. Clean the dust away and it will look brand-new once more.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Physical DMG Bonus +25%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

pieces.name: Stainless Bloom
pieces.lore: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

pieces.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
pieces.lore: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

pieces.name: Moment of Cessation
pieces.lore: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

pieces.name: Surpassing Cup
pieces.lore: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

pieces.name: Mocking Mask
pieces.lore: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: ATK +18%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When casting an Elemental Skill, if the character has 15 or more Energy, they lose 15 Energy and Normal/Charged/Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 50% for 10s. This effect will not trigger again during that duration.

pieces.name: Entangling Bloom
pieces.lore: A lovely amulet made from twisted paper cord. It is said to hold the power to make wishes come true.

pieces.name: Shaft of Remembrance
pieces.lore: A demon-slaying arrow of a rather ancient make. It seems to have been preserved with great care by someone, even until the present day.

pieces.name: Morning Dew's Moment
pieces.lore: A bronze pocket watch adorned with twisted paper cord and a bell. Its hands are forever frozen at the dawn of a certain autumn day.

pieces.name: Hopeful Heart
pieces.lore: A special fortune-telling cylindrical object. The mechanism at the bottom allows one to easily remove all unwanted wish sticks.

pieces.name: Capricious Visage
pieces.lore: A well-preserved ceremonial fox mask. A small, enigmatic smile ever graces its lips.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Energy Recharge +20%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

pieces.name: Magnificent Tsuba
pieces.lore: Legends has it that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

pieces.name: Sundered Feather
pieces.lore: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

pieces.name: Storm Cage
pieces.lore: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

pieces.name: Scarlet Vessel
pieces.lore: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

pieces.name: Ornate Kabuto
pieces.lore: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: DEF +30%

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: A character equipped with this Artifact set will obtain the Curiosity effect in the following conditions:When on the field, the character gains 1 stack after hitting an opponent with a Geo attack, triggering a maximum of once every 0.3s.When off the field, the character gains 1 stack every 3s.Curiosity can stack up to 4 times, each providing 6% DEF and a 6% Geo DMG Bonus.When 6 seconds pass without gaining a Curiosity stack, 1 stack is lost.

pieces.name: Bloom Times
pieces.lore: A small golden ornament with six petals that shall never wilt. It symbolizes the transience of mortal glories.

pieces.name: Plume of Luxury
pieces.lore: A feather-shaped token that was brought forth from a secluded hall. The compassion of its creator led to it being left within that mansion along with a certain slumbering form.

pieces.name: Song of Life
pieces.lore: As far as Inazuma is concerned, this is some small object from overseas. The heart of this mechanism has been removed, and its hands no longer turn.

pieces.name: Calabash of Awakening
pieces.lore: A gourd that has been adorned with powdered gold and black paint. Its original color can no longer be discerned, but its main use seems to be as a performance prop.

pieces.name: Skeletal Hat
pieces.lore: A hat that once shielded a wanderer from sun and rain. It eventually became a convenient tool with which faces might be hidden and expressions obscured.

bonuses.name: Two Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: Healing Bonus +15%.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When the character equipping this artifact set heals a character in the party, a Sea-Dyed Foam will appear for 3 seconds, accumulating the amount of HP recovered from healing (including overflow healing).At the end of the duration, the Sea-Dyed Foam will explode, dealing DMG to nearby opponents based on 90% of the accumulated healing.(This DMG is calculated similarly to Reactions such as Electro-Charged, and Superconduct, but it is not affected by Elemental Mastery, Character Levels, or Reaction DMG Bonuses).Only one Sea-Dyed Foam can be produced every 3.5 seconds.Each Sea-Dyed Foam can accumulate up to 30,000 HP (including overflow healing).There can be no more than one Sea-Dyed Foam active at any given time.This effect can still be triggered even when the character who is using this artifact set is not on the field.

pieces.name: Sea-Dyed Blossom
pieces.lore: A soft flower that has taken on the many shades of the capricious ocean. It shines with wondrous colors under the moon's silver light.

pieces.name: Deep Palace's Plume
pieces.lore: A down feather with the same hue as coral, said to come from a shrine maiden's ceremonial garment.

pieces.name: Cowry of Parting
pieces.lore: A clean, flawless shell that comes from the bottomless ocean.

pieces.name: Pearl Cage
pieces.lore: The shining pearls that the shrine maidens of Watatsumi Island offer up shine eternally and never dim.

pieces.name: Crown of Watatsumi
pieces.lore: An ancient, intricate crown that was once used by a forgotten clergy member. Today, this relic has been enshrined with great ceremony by the people of Watatsumi.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: After using an Elemental Burst. this character will gain the Nascent Light effect, increasing their ATK by 8% for 16s. When the character's HP decreases, their ATK will further increase by 10%. This increase can occur this way maximum of 4 times. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s. Nascent Light will be dispelled when the character leaves the field. If an Elemental Burst is used again during the duration of Nascent Light, the original Nascent Light will be dispelled.

pieces.name: Flowering Life
pieces.lore: An ancient memento. It still looks as alive as the being that preserved it several centuries ago.

pieces.name: Feather of Nascent Light
pieces.lore: A dimly lustrous pinion steeped in strong memories.

pieces.name: Solar Relic
pieces.lore: An ancient timepiece with a mighty solid look. Its luster is produced by sand crystal.

pieces.name: Moment of the Pact
pieces.lore: An old cup made of sand crystal. Its luster is somehow undimmed by age.

pieces.name: Thundering Poise
pieces.lore: This mask is said to have been made by the mountain people for a Yaksha. It is of simple make, but its surface still shines brightly nonetheless.

bonuses.name: Four Piece Bonus
bonuses.effect: When Normal Attacks hit opponents, there is a 36% chance that it will trigger Valley Rite, which will increase Normal Attack DMG by 70% of ATK.This effect will be dispelled 0.05s after a Normal Attack deals DMG.If a Normal Attack fails to trigger Valley Rite, the odds of it triggering the next time will increase by 20%.This trigger can occur once every 0.2s.

pieces.name: Soulscent Bloom
pieces.lore: A jade carved into the shape of a flower. A phantom scent, here one instant and gone the next, swirls around it.

pieces.name: Jade Leaf
pieces.lore: A jade ornament shaped like a leaf. It seems to have once had deep meaning between specific friends.

pieces.name: Symbol of Felicitation
pieces.lore: A circular jade ornament. Legend has it that it was once used somewhere as a symbol for rituals to begin.

pieces.name: Chalice of the Font
pieces.lore: This teacup forever overflows with fresh water. Perhaps it was a gift from an adeptus, one of their relics, or just something they left behind.

pieces.name: Flowing Rings
pieces.lore: A pair of earrings made from a single piece of jade. It has a most gentle texture.
